author: admin
title: Global 3D Camera Market 2015-2019 - Reportlinker Review
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/15/2015 @ 2:29 PM   ReportLinker 
NEW YORK, Oct. 15, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- About 3D cameraA 3D camera is used to capture or record images or visuals in 3D format; this camera helps enhance the quality of images and visuals. An image captured by 3D camera is of good quality compared to that through a 2D camera. Also, it is possible to view the in-depth detail to the image compared an image captured by a 2D camera. For instance, Intel has recently introduced realsense 3D depth sensing camera for tablets, laptops, and smartphones. Technavio's analysts forecast the global 3D camera market to grow at a CAGR of 41.31% over the period 2014-2019. Covered in this report The report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the global 3D camera market for the period 2015-2019. The market size is calculated on the basis of revenue generated from 3D cameras that include professional camera, 3D cameras used in smartphones, tablets, laptops, and others electronic devices including 3D camcorders.Technavio's report, Global 3D Camera Market 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers the Americas, APAC and EMEA; it also covers the landscape of the global 3D camera market and its growth prospects in the coming years. The report includes a discussion of the key vendors operating in this market. Key regions
